gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.scenegraph

Class AbstractPositionEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.scenegraph.SceneGraphNode
      • gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.scenegraph.AbstractPositionEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISceneGraphNode, IPosition
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blob, CelestialBody, Grid, LineObject, Mw

    public abstract class AbstractPositionEntity
extends SceneGraphNode
    A base abstract graphical entity with the basics.
    Author:
    Toni Sagrista

      • pos

        public Vector3d pos
        Position of this entity in the local reference system. The units are Constants.U_TO_KM by default.

        public abstract void updateLocalValues(ITimeFrameProvider time,
